articles.title: Double whammy of flu and Covid will overwhelm NHS this winter, modelling warns - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: New report comes amid early signs that the upcoming flu season 'could be severe' in Europe, especially for the elderly
articles.content:
The NHS will be overwhelmed this winter by a lethal combination of Covid-19 and flu, new modelling has suggested, amid warnings that Europe is on track for a severe influenza season.
